00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStreamG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014

00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE PostStreamG
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Fs, ux, uy, UG, U_sq, v
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, tau, invTau, invTau2
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoU
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: geq, Gam, GamW
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradRhoD
00047 
00048 
00049  DO j = yl, yu
00050    DO i = xl, xu
00051 
00052 ! Define some local values
00053      rhon = rho(i,j)
00054      ux   = u(i,j,1)
00055      uy   = u(i,j,2)
00056      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00057      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00058      invTau  = 1.D0/(1.D0 + 2.D0*tau)
00059      invTau2 = tau*invTau
00060 
00061 ! Identify neighboring cells
00062      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00063      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00064      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00065      js = ni(i,j,4)
00066 
00067 !--------- Directional derivatives ---------------------------------------------
00068 ! Gradient of the density rho
00069      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,j)  - rho(iw,j) )
00070      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,jn)  - rho(i,js) )
00071      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,j)  - rho(ie,j) )
00072      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho(i,js)  - rho(i,jn) )
00073      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,jn) - rho(iw,js) )
00074      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )
00075      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho(iw,js) - rho(ie,jn) )
00076      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )
00077 
00078 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution function g --------
00079 ! This definition of Gamma (Gam) is different from Lee-Lin because we embed the
00080 ! product by invCs_sq (needed in the collision term) in the definition itself
00081      GamW(0) = W0C*U_sq
00082      Gam(0)  = invCs_sq*( W0 - GamW(0) )
00083      geq(0)  = W0C*p(i,j) - rhon*GamW(0)
00084 
00085      GamW(1) = W1C*(ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00086      Gam(1)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(1) )
00087      geq(1)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(1)
00088 
00089      GamW(2) = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00090      Gam(2)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(2) )
00091      geq(2)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(2)
00092 
00093      GamW(3) = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00094      Gam(3)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(3) )
00095      geq(3)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(3)
00096 
00097      GamW(4) = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00098      Gam(4)  = invCs_sq*( W1 + GamW(4) )
00099      geq(4)  = W1C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(4)
00100 
00101      v       = ux + uy
00102      GamW(5) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00103      Gam(5)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(5) )
00104      geq(5)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(5)
00105 
00106      v      = -ux + uy
00107      GamW(6) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00108      Gam(6)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(6) )
00109      geq(6)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(6)
00110 
00111      v       = -ux - uy
00112      GamW(7) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00113      Gam(7)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(7) )
00114      geq(7)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(7)
00115 
00116      v       = ux - uy
00117      GamW(8) = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00118      Gam(8)  = invCs_sq*( W2 + GamW(8) )
00119      geq(8)  = W2C*p(i,j) + rhon*GamW(8)
00120 
00121 ! Define directional terms that go with "u" and are common to all g components
00122      gradRhoU = ux*gradRhoX(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY(i,j)
00123      UG       = ux*GX(i,j)       + uy*GY(i,j)
00124 
00125 !--------- Collision and stream for the g distribution function ----------------
00126      Fs = GamW(0)*gradRhoU + Gam(0)*UG
00127      g(i,j,0) = gbar(i,j,0) + invTau*( geq(0) - gbar(i,j,0) ) - invTau2*Fs
00128 
00129 ! Direction 1
00130      Fs = GamW(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(1)*( GX(i,j) - UG )
00131      g(i,j,1) = gbar(i,j,1) + invTau*( geq(1) - gbar(i,j,1) ) + invTau2*Fs
00132 
00133 ! Direction 2
00134      Fs = GamW(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(2)*( GY(i,j) - UG )
00135      g(i,j,2) = gbar(i,j,2) + invTau*( geq(2) - gbar(i,j,2) ) + invTau2*Fs
00136 
00137 ! Direction 3
00138      Fs = GamW(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(3)*( GX(i,j) + UG )
00139      g(i,j,3) = gbar(i,j,3) + invTau*( geq(3) - gbar(i,j,3) ) + invTau2*Fs
00140 
00141 ! Direction 4
00142      Fs = GamW(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(4)*( GY(i,j) + UG )
00143      g(i,j,4) = gbar(i,j,4) + invTau*( geq(4) - gbar(i,j,4) ) + invTau2*Fs
00144 
00145 ! Direction 5
00146      Fs = GamW(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(5)*( GX(i,j) + GY(i,j) - UG )
00147      g(i,j,5) = gbar(i,j,5) + invTau*( geq(5) - gbar(i,j,5) ) + invTau2*Fs
00148 
00149 ! Direction 6 
00150      Fs = GamW(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(6)*( GX(i,j) - GY(i,j) + UG )
00151      g(i,j,6) = gbar(i,j,6) + invTau*( geq(6) - gbar(i,j,6) ) + invTau2*Fs
00152 
00153 ! Direction 7
00154      Fs = GamW(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - gradRhoU ) - Gam(7)*( GX(i,j) + GY(i,j) + UG )
00155      g(i,j,7) = gbar(i,j,7) + invTau*( geq(7) - gbar(i,j,7) ) + invTau2*Fs
00156 
00157 ! Direction 8
00158      Fs = GamW(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - gradRhoU ) + Gam(8)*( GX(i,j) - GY(i,j) - UG )
00159      g(i,j,8) = gbar(i,j,8) + invTau*( geq(8) - gbar(i,j,8) ) + invTau2*Fs
00160 
00161    END DO
00162  END DO
00163 
00164 
00165  RETURN
00166  END SUBROUTINE PostStreamG
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
